ATTRIBUTS.ITEM: BEGIN OF actions, existence TYPE td_action VALUE '-', "#EC NOTEXT object TYPE td_action VALUE 'O', "#EC NOTEXT messaging TYPE td_action VALUE 'M', "#EC NOTEXT information TYPE td_action VALUE 'I', "#EC NOTEXT process_data TYPE td_action VALUE 'D', "#EC NOTEXT END OF actions `

BEGIN OF job_status, " From LBTCHDEF@266 running TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'R', "#EC NOTEXT ready TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'Y', "#EC NOTEXT scheduled TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'P', "#EC NOTEXT released TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'S', "#EC NOTEXT aborted TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'A', "#EC NOTEXT finished TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'F', "#EC NOTEXT put_active TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'Z', "#EC NOTEXT unknown_state TYPE tbtco-status VALUE 'X', "#EC NOTEXT END OF Job_status `
BEGIN OF lock_modes , read TYPE td_lock_mode VALUE 'S', "#EC NOTEXT write TYPE td_lock_mode VALUE 'E', "#EC NOTEXT exclusive TYPE td_lock_mode VALUE 'X', "#EC NOTEXT END OF lock_modes `
BEGIN OF scope_modes , dialog_only TYPE td_scope VALUE '1', "#EC NOTEXT update_only TYPE td_scope VALUE '2', "#EC NOTEXT both TYPE td_scope VALUE '3', "#EC NOTEXT END OF scope_modes `

BEGIN OF system_categories, * data_bloc TYPE td_category VALUE '_D', "#EC NOTEXT run_info TYPE td_category VALUE '_I', "#EC NOTEXT obj_conf TYPE td_category VALUE '_O', "#EC NOTEXT task_def TYPE td_category VALUE '_P', "#EC NOTEXT condition TYPE td_category VALUE '_C', "#EC NOTEXT END OF system_categories `

BEGIN OF system_status, BEGIN OF process, started TYPE td_status VALUE 'l', "#EC NOTEXT in_progress TYPE td_status VALUE 'i', "#EC NOTEXT stop_requested TYPE td_status VALUE 'r', "#EC NOTEXT interupted TYPE td_status VALUE 's', "#EC NOTEXT finished TYPE td_status VALUE 'd', "#EC NOTEXT END OF process, BEGIN OF bloc, to_do TYPE td_status VALUE 't', "#EC NOTEXT in_progress TYPE td_status VALUE 'i', "#EC NOTEXT done TYPE td_status VALUE 'd', "#EC NOTEXT END OF bloc, BEGIN OF object, inconsistency TYPE td_status VALUE 'x', "#EC NOTEXT already_done TYPE td_status VALUE 'd', "#EC NOTEXT END OF object, END OF system_status `
